rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg001
rows.name:
Hey, Saika.
Zeke's a rather unlucky guy, is he not?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg002
rows.name: Isn't it difficult, being his partner?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg003
rows.name:
Oh, yes. That Prince of mine, he's
unlucky like you wouldn't believe.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg004
rows.name:
If there was an All-Alst Unluckiness
Championship, he'd win every time.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg005
rows.name:
From the incidents I've witnessed
alone, he's already been chased by
rolling rocks, fallen off cliffs...

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg006
rows.name:
He even fell into the Cloud Sea once,
as I recall.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg007
rows.name: Haha, you ain't seen the half of it.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg008
rows.name:
When he's walking in the harbor,
he's always getting bitten or smacked
round the face by the Divine Beast ships.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg018
rows.name:
Oh, this one time, he got caught in a
blizzard, took shelter in a cave, and
wound up surrounded by 100 Ignas!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg009
rows.name: Ahaha! I could keep going for hours.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg010
rows.name: Well, I don't quite know how to react.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg011
rows.name:
Frankly, I'm impressed you're both
still alive.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg012
rows.name:
Yes, congratulations on surviving.
Or should I say, my condolences?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg013
rows.name: Too far, Kagutsuchi. Too far.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg014
rows.name:
Still, I gotta admit keeping an eye
on my Prince is a full-time job.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg015
rows.name:
You should try it yourself some time.
He drives me crazy.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg019
rows.name: How shall I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg016
rows.name: But you love him all the same, yes?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg017
rows.name: You sound almost like his mother.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg101
rows.name:
Love?! Where the hell'd you pull
THAT one out of? Eheheh...

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg102
rows.name:
Ah yes, I see. You pretend to dislike
him while secretly harboring feelings.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg103
rows.name:
Maybe it's time you should be more
honest with yourself?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg104
rows.name:
Oh, for the...you've got to be kidding
me! You couldn't be more wrong!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg105
rows.name: There's no need to be shy, my dear.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg106
rows.name:
As a fellow Blade, I'll be happy to
keep this just between us.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg107
rows.name:
Quite so. We will keep your little
secret from your beloved Prince
until such time as you see fit.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg108
rows.name: I'm trying to tell you, it's not like that!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg109
rows.name:
Oh, you're so cute when you
get embarrassed.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg112
rows.name: Hmhm! I quite agree...

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg110
rows.name:
Hey! Stop that!
Don't you give me that knowing smile!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg111
rows.name:
Ughhhh, curse you, my Prince, and
your unlucky nature!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg201
rows.name:
Oh yes, he's such a frightful
little sonny Jim...

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg202
rows.name: ...Wait, who're you calling his mom?!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg203
rows.name: At least go for big sister or something!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg204
rows.name:
Ah, what a comeback! What
impeccable comedic delivery!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg205
rows.name:
Haha, you like it?
You've gotta have a sharp wit when
you're dealing with that guy.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg210
rows.name:
But comedy aside... It all comes
back to his blasted bad luck.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg211
rows.name:
If you had to deal with some of the
stuff I've been through, you'd be
worrying like an old maid, too.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg212
rows.name:
When it really counts, he can be a
proper hero, but the rest of the time...
I just don't know what to do with him.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg213
rows.name:
It wouldn't be Zeke without a little
bad luck, though, would it?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg214
rows.name:
I quite agree. It's an integral
part of his identity!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg215
rows.name:
Yep...and ain't that just the
worst thing?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg216
rows.name:
*sigh*
The things I put up with for my Prince...
